law.history: Repealed 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 266, sec. 11, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 156, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 364, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 2, effective March 29, 1976. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 1. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 1. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Optional purchase of supplemental textbooks, materials, and equipment.
